verses.verse: זֶ֣ה <WH2088> zeh This סֵ֔פֶר <WH5612> Se-fer, [is] the book תּוֹלְדֹ֖ת <WH8435> tol-Dot of the generations אָדָ֑ם <WH121> 'a-Dam; of Adam בְּי֗וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom, In the day בְּרֹ֤א <WH1254> be-Ro created אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> E-lo-Him that God אָדָ֔ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, man בִּדְמ֥וּת <WH1823> bid-Mut in the likeness אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> E-lo-Him of God עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah made אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> o-To.

זָכָ֥ר <WH2145> za-Char Male וּנְקֵבָ֖ה <WH5347> u-ne-ke-Vah and female בְּרָאָ֑ם <WH1254> be-ra-'Am; created וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <WH1288> vay-Va-rech he them and blessed אֹתָ֗ם <WH853> 'o-Tam, וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra them and called אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁמָם֙ <WH8034> she-Mam their name אָדָ֔ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, Adam בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom in the day הִבָּֽרְאָֽם׃ <WH1254> hib-Ba-re-'Am. when they were created ס sa-Mek

וַֽיְחִ֣י <WH2421> vay-Chi lived אָדָ֗ם <WH121> 'a-Dam, And Adam שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim and thirty וּמְאַת֙ <WH3967> u-me-'At an hundred שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led and begat בִּדְמוּת֖וֹ <WH1823> bid-mu-To [a son] in his own likeness כְּצַלְמ֑וֹ <WH6754> ke-tzal-Mo; after his image וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra and called אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo his name שֵֽׁת׃ <WH8352> Shet. Seth

וַיִּֽהְי֣וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu Then יְמֵי־ <WH3117> ye-mei- And the days אָדָ֗ם <WH121> 'a-Dam, of Adam אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> ho-li-Do he had begotten אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֵׁ֔ת <WH8352> Shet, Seth שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> she-mo-Neh were eight מֵאֹ֖ת <WH3967> me-'Ot hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led and he begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> ba-Nim sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> u-va-Not. and daughters

וַיִּֽהְי֞וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu become כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יְמֵ֤י <WH3117> ye-Mei And all the days אָדָם֙ <WH121> 'a-Dam that Adam אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after חַ֔י <WH2416> Chai, age תְּשַׁ֤ע <WH8672> te-Sha' were nine מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> me-'Ot hundred שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <WH7970> u-she-lo-Shim and thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> vai-ya-Mot. and he died ס sa-Mek

וַֽיְחִי־ <WH2421> vay-chi- lived שֵׁ֕ת <WH8352> shet And Seth חָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh and five שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> sha-Nim years וּמְאַ֣ת <WH3967> u-me-'At hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led and begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱנֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH583> e-Noosh. Enos

וַֽיְחִי־ <WH2421> vay-chi- lived שֵׁ֗ת <WH8352> Shet, And Seth אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> ho-li-Do he begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱנ֔וֹשׁ <WH583> e-Noosh, Enos שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> She-va' and seven שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> sha-Nim, years וּשְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> u-she-mo-Neh eight מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led and begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> ba-Nim sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> u-va-Not. and daughters

וַיִּֽהְיוּ֙ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu become כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יְמֵי־ <WH3117> ye-mei- And all the days שֵׁ֔ת <WH8352> Shet, of Seth שְׁתֵּ֤ים <WH8147> she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years וּתְשַׁ֥ע <WH8672> u-te-Sha' were nine מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> vai-ya-Mot. and he died ס sa-Mek

וַֽיְחִ֥י <WH2421> vay-Chi lived אֱנ֖וֹשׁ <WH583> e-Noosh And Enos תִּשְׁעִ֣ים <WH8673> tish-'Im ninety שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led and begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קֵינָֽן׃ <WH7018> kei-Nan. Cainan

וַֽיְחִ֣י <WH2421> vay-Chi lived אֱנ֗וֹשׁ <WH583> e-Noosh, And Enos אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> ho-li-Do he begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קֵינָ֔ן <WH7018> kei-Nan, Cainan חֲמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh fif עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years וּשְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> u-she-mo-Neh eight מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led and begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> ba-Nim sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> u-va-Not. and daughters

וַֽיְחִ֥י <WH2421> vay-Chi lived קֵינָ֖ן <WH7018> kei-Nan And Cainan שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> shiv-'Im seventy שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led and begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מַֽהֲלַלְאֵֽל׃ <WH4111> Ma-ha-lal-'El. Mahalaleel

וַיְחִ֣י <WH2421> vay-Chi lived קֵינָ֗ן <WH7018> kei-Nan, And Cainan אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> ho-li-Do he begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מַֽהֲלַלְאֵ֔ל <WH4111> ma-ha-lal-'El, Mahalaleel אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im and forty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years וּשְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> u-she-mo-Neh eight מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led and begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> ba-Nim sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> u-va-Not. and daughters

Jared

וַֽיְחִ֣י <WH2421> vay-Chi lived מַֽהֲלַלְאֵ֗ל <WH4111> ma-ha-lal-'El, And Mahalaleel אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> ho-li-Do he begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יֶ֔רֶד <WH3382> Ye-red, Jared שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim and thirty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years וּשְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> u-she-mo-Neh eight מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led and begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> ba-Nim sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> u-va-Not. and daughters

וַֽיְחִי־ <WH2421> vay-chi- lived יֶ֕רֶד <WH3382> Ye-red And Jared שְׁתַּ֧יִם <WH8147> she-Ta-yim and two וְשִׁשִּׁ֛ים <WH8346> ve-shish-Shim sixty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> sha-Nah years וּמְאַ֣ת <WH3967> u-me-'At an hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led and he begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֲנֽוֹךְ׃ <WH2585> cha-Noch. Enoch

וַֽיְחִי־ <WH2421> vay-chi- lived יֶ֗רֶד <WH3382> Ye-red, And Jared אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> ho-li-Do he begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֲנ֔וֹךְ <WH2585> cha-Noch, Enoch שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> she-mo-Neh eight מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led and begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> ba-Nim sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> u-va-Not. and daughters

וַֽיְחִ֣י <WH2421> vay-Chi lived חֲנ֔וֹךְ <WH2585> cha-Noch, And Enoch חָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh and five וְשִׁשִּׁ֖ים <WH8346> ve-shish-Shim sixty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led and begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מְתוּשָֽׁלַח׃ <WH4968> me-tu-Sha-lach. Methuselah

וַיִּתְהַלֵּ֨ךְ <WH1980> vai-yit-hal-Lech walked חֲנ֜וֹךְ <WH2585> cha-Noch And Enoch אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with הָֽאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, God אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> ho-li-Do and begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מְתוּשֶׁ֔לַח <WH4968> me-tu-She-lach, Methuselah שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led the father בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> ba-Nim sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> u-va-Not. and daughters

וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> vay-Hi become כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> ye-Mei And all the days חֲנ֑וֹךְ <WH2585> cha-Noch; of Enoch חָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh and five וְשִׁשִּׁים֙ <WH8346> ve-shish-Shim sixty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years וּשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> u-she-Losh were three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> sha-Nah. years

וַיִּתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <WH1980> vai-yit-hal-Lech walked חֲנ֖וֹךְ <WH2585> cha-Noch And Enoch אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; with God וְאֵינֶ֕נּוּ <WH369> ve-'ei-Nen-nu else כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for לָקַ֥ח <WH3947> la-Kach took אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. and he [was] not for God פ Peh

וַיְחִ֣י <WH2421> vay-Chi lived מְתוּשֶׁ֔לַח <WH4968> me-tu-She-lach, And Methuselah שֶׁ֧בַע <WH7651> She-va' and seven וּשְׁמֹנִ֛ים <WH8084> u-she-mo-Nim eighty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> sha-Nah years וּמְאַ֣ת <WH3967> u-me-'At hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led and begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- לָֽמֶךְ׃ <WH3929> La-mech. Lamech

וַֽיְחִ֣י <WH2421> vay-Chi lived מְתוּשֶׁ֗לַח <WH4968> me-tu-She-lach, And Methuselah אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> ho-li-Do he begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- לֶ֔מֶךְ <WH3929> Le-mech, Lamech שְׁתַּ֤יִם <WH8147> she-Ta-yim and two וּשְׁמוֹנִים֙ <WH8084> u-she-mo-Nim eighty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years וּשְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> u-she-Va' seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led and begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> ba-Nim sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> u-va-Not. and daughters
